mapper.select: SELECT b.mber_id, c.cntnt_id, c.cntnt_title, c.cntnt_url FROM tb_cntnt_bkmk a join tb_mber b on a.cntnt_bkmk_mber_id = b.mber_id join tb_cntnt c on a.cntnt_bkmk_cntnt_id = c.cntnt_id WHERE c.cntnt_delete_yn = 'N' AND mber_id = #{mberId} ORDER BY a.cntnt_bkmk_regist_date desc

SELECT b.goods_id, b.goods_name, b.goods_brand, b.goods_price, b.goods_purchs_link, d.goods_file_id FROM tb_goods_bkmk a JOIN tb_goods b ON a.goods_bkmk_goods_id = b.goods_id JOIN tb_mber c ON a.goods_bkmk_mber_id = c.mber_id JOIN tb_goods_file d ON b.goods_id = d.goods_file_goods_id WHERE a.goods_bkmk_mber_id='wook1123' AND b.goods_delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY a.goods_bkmk_regist_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cntnt_bkmk (cntnt_bkmk_mber_id, cntnt_bkmk_cntnt_id, cntnt_bkmk_regist_date) VALUES (#{mberId}, #{cntntId}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))
INSERT INTO tb_goods_bkmk (goods_bkmk_goods_id, goods_bkmk_mber_id, goods_bkmk_regist_date) VALUES (#{goodsId}, #{mberId}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))
mapper.select:
SELECT g.goods_id, g.goods_name, g.goods_brand, g.goods_price, g.goods_purchs_link, g.goods_kwrd, g.goods_regist_date, g.goods_update_date, g.goods_delete_yn, f.goods_file_id, f.goods_file_path, f.goods_file_name, b.goods_bkmk_regist_date
from tb_goods g left outer join tb_goods_file f on g.goods_id = f.goods_file_goods_id left outer join (select * from tb_goods_bkmk WHERE goods_bkmk_mber_id = #{mberId}) b on g.goods_id = b.goods_bkmk_goods_id WHERE g.goods_id = #{goodsId}
